name: dockerfile-project
description: Node.js files/configurations that support the creation of Dockerfiles
author: Brian Zalewski <brian@megabyte.space> (https://megabyte.space)

scripts.build:latest: docker build --build-arg BUILD_DATE=$(git show -s --format=%cI) --build-arg REVISION=$(git rev-parse HEAD) --build-arg VERSION=${npm_package_version} --tag megabytelabs/dockerfile-project:latest --tag megabytelabs/dockerfile-project:${npm_package_version} .
scripts.build:slim: docker-slim build --tag megabytelabs/dockerfile-project:slim DOCKER_SLIM_COMMAND_HERE megabytelabs/dockerfile-project:latest && prettier --write slim.report.json
scripts.build:slim-version: docker-slim build --tag megabytelabs/dockerfile-project:${npm_package_version}-slim DOCKER_SLIM_COMMAND_HERE megabytelabs/dockerfile-project:latest && prettier --write slim.report.json
scripts.prepare-release: run-s test build update test version
scripts.publish:prepare: npx lint-staged && run-s prepare-release && git push --follow-tags origin master && run-s build && git add slim.report.json && git commit -m 'chore(slim-report) Adding slim.report.json.' && git push origin master
scripts.publish:readme-description: SHORT_DESCRIPTION=$(cat .blueprint.json | jq '.dockerhub_description' | cut -d '"' -f 2) && docker pushrm --short "${SHORT_DESCRIPTION}" megabytelabs/${npm_package_name}
scripts.test:preprettier: if [ -f slim.report.json ]; then prettier --write slim.report.json; fi && if [ -f .blueprint.json ]; then prettier --write .blueprint.json; fi
scripts.test:shellcheck: find . -type d \( -name .cache -o -name .git -o -name .husky -o -name .modules -o -name node_modules \) -prune -false -o -name .start.sh -prune -o -type f -name \*.sh -print0 | xargs -0 -r -n1 shellcheck

scripts-info.build: Build the regular Docker image and then build the slim image
scripts-info.build:slim: Build a compact Docker image with DockerSlim
scripts-info.commit: The preferred way of running git commit (instead of git commit, we prefer you run 'npm run commit' in the root of this repository)
scripts-info.info: Logs descriptions of all the npm tasks
scripts-info.prepare-release: Updates the CHANGELOG with commits made using 'npm run commit' and updates the project to be ready for release
scripts-info.publish: Creates new release(s) and uploads the release(s) to DockerHub
scripts-info.shell: Run the Docker container and open a shell
scripts-info.sizes: List the sizes of the Docker images on the system
scripts-info.test: Validates the Dockerfile, tests the Docker image, and performs project linting
scripts-info.update: Runs .start.sh to automatically update meta files and documentation
scripts-info.version: Used by 'npm run prepare-release' to update the CHANGELOG and app version
